query: Next.js pages router migrate to app router

curated_results.title: App Router Migration | Next.js
curated_results.snippet: Complete guide to migrating from the pages directory to the app directory in Next.js 13+. Step-by-step migration process.

curated_results.title: App Directory (Beta) | Next.js
curated_results.snippet: The app directory is a new paradigm for building applications in Next.js 13. It replaces the pages directory structure.

curated_results.title: Next.js 13 App Directory - Vercel Blog
curated_results.snippet: Introducing the app directory: a new way to build applications with Next.js 13 featuring improved layouts and routing.
